GPM8213LAN package¶

Module contents¶

GPM-8213-LAN access and smart measurment

@author: Hugo_MILAN

email : hugo.milan@ens-paris-saclay.fr

GPM8213LAN.instrument module¶

GPM8213LAN.instrument implements the following classes:

Instrument

High-level of GPM representation

class GPM8213LAN.instrument.Instrument(HOST, PORT=23, timeout=2, variables=[], pattern=4)¶

Bases: object

HOST

str , local ip address of the GPM (voir System > Congig > LAN on the GPM).

PORT

int ,23 for the GPM ,Telnet protocol.

Timeout

float , time seconds to raise an error.

Variables

list of Variable, variable to measure.

Pattern

int de 1 à 4 ,preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual.

add_variable(variable)¶
Variable

Variable or list of Variable

Do

add a Variable or list of Variable to the list of varaible (max : 34), don’t use self.variables.append(variable)

Returns

None

ask_variable()¶
Returns

str,variables values

change_pattern(new_patt)¶
New_patt

int de 1 à 4 ,preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual.

Change the Preset (pattern) with the new one (new_patt)

Returns

None

change_variables(variables)¶
Variable

Variable or list of Variable

Reset variables then add variables

Returns

None

close_connection()¶

close the connection and remove the remote control on the GPM

Returns

None

connect_to_instrument()¶

Establishes the connection with a GPM (via the socket library) and verifies that it is accessible

Returns

None

identification()¶

fetch the basics data about the GPM used :return: None

mesure_variable()¶
Returns

dict of float,variables values

parser_variables(data)¶
Data

str,variables values

Convert string format to dico of float format

Returns

dict of float,variables values

send_query(message)¶

Send a query, see user manual to know which command are query or set

Returns

str, GPM’s answer

send_set(message)¶

Send a set, see user manual to know which command are query or set

Returns

None

set_a_variable(variable, number)¶

DO NOT USE, send set to change 1 Variable of VALUE? command

Returns

None

set_variable()¶

DO NOT USE, send set to change VariableS of VALUE? command

Returns

None

variables_pattern()¶

DO NOT USE, associate variables with the current PRESET

Returns

None

GPM8213LAN.measurement module¶

GPM8213LAN.measurement implements the following classes:

Measurement

instance of measuring to automate the measure process

Measurement_mode

type of measurement with specific parameter

class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement(mode='single', instruments=[])¶

Bases: object

Mode

str or Measurement_mode, ‘single’ or ‘continuous’ or ‘integrator’

instruments

list of Instrument

Creates a measurement Insantance to specify the mode, devices and variables to be measured.

You have to specifies variables of each Instrument or use homogenize_variables()

Warning: these devices are very little reactive and precise and synchronized measurements are impossible, we advise you to use them during steady-state

add_intruments(instrument)¶
Instrument

Instrument

add an Instrument

:return None

homogenize_variables(variables=[], pattern=4)¶
Variables

list of Variable, variable to measure.

Pattern

int de 1 à 4 ,preset varaibles see page 94 and 95 of user manual

change variables/Preset of each instrument :return: None

class GPM8213LAN.measurement.Measurement_mode(mode)¶

Bases: object

defines type of measurment and its parameters

Mode

str in : single : one measure on call continuous : multiple single measure integrator : interger power during time (see urser manual p53)

specification(sample_time=1, time=10)¶
Sample_time

int, sample time in secondes (continuous mode)

time

int, time in secondes (continuous and integrator mode)

defines time and sample time which will be use if necessary :return: *None

GPM8213LAN.variable module¶

GPM8213LAN.variable implements the following classes:

Variable

variable which GPM-8213 can measure

class GPM8213LAN.variable.Variable(function)¶

Bases: object

Function

str in variable_available

Function to display, to find the list go to page 76 and 77 in user manual see variable_available to see variable of GPM-8213

GPM8213LAN.variable.variable_available()¶
Returns

list of str, all function of GPM-8213
